headline: Does Ecolab’s 20% 2025 Surge Reflect Its True Value?
summary: If you have been eyeing Ecolab and wondering whether now is the moment to jump in or hold back, you are hardly alone. The stock’s trajectory this year has given investors plenty to consider. Up 20.0% year-to-date and boasting an impressive 82.4% gain over the last three years, Ecolab has outperformed broader markets by a respectable margin. However, that performance has not come without its share of volatility. Over the last month, the stock climbed 2.3%, but the past week saw a slight 1.0%...
